script_message_1: Hi I'm a Programming Student / Web Developer
script_message_2: Hi I'm a Programming Student / Web Designer
about_text: Hello and welcome! My name is Olivier Labrecque-Lacasse, and I am a front-end web development intern. I am excited to be part of this team and have the opportunity to work on challenging projects that will allow me to develop my skills and gain real-world experience in the field. My background in 42 Quebec has provided me with a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Wordpress and other web development technologies. I am eager to learn from experienced professionals and contribute my knowledge and creativity to the team. I am confident that this internship will not only help me grow as a developer but also make a valuable contribution to the organization. Thank you for the opportunity, and I look forward to working with you.
current_project: Currently, I am working on developing a mobile app using React Native and integrating it with Firebase. Additionally, I am studying algorithms and data structures to improve my problem-solving skills.
project_42_description: The projects done at 42 Quebec are developed by a qualified pedagogical team, in order to allow a constant learning curve. Some projects are mandatory while others are optional, depending on the ambitions and interests of each student. Some are common to all RÃ©seau 42 campuses while it is possible to find projects that correspond to the reality of the local job market. Skills developed : Autonomy, organization, critical thinking.
fdf_description: The representation of terrain in relief is a key practice in modern cartography. For example, in this era of space exploration, having a three-dimensional reproduction of the surface of Mars is an indispensable prerequisite for the conquest of this planet. Another example, comparing three-dimensional representations of an area where tectonic activity is important allows us to better understand these phenomena and their evolution, and therefore to be better prepared.
contact_message: Want to leave a feedback about this awesome Portfolio? Want to pass me in interview? Please let me know. :)
footer_text: I am about to finish my training in digital information architecture offered by 42 Quebec and I am looking for an internship that would allow me to perfect my learning. My various mandates have led me to take charge of large-scale projects that have allowed me to develop my web skills, my autonomy and perfect my teamwork through organizational and leadership skills.
